modName: Scenic Skyrim Menu Re-placer with Randomizer
summary: Hey there Nexites! Mellophonist here with my second mod! Due to more popularity then I anticipated from my wallpaper set I\'ve decided to make a menu re-placer out of 26 of the most popular pictures from that set!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/1921/55874403.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=#F0F8FF][i] [size=4]Description:[/size][/i][/color]

[color=#00BFFF] [b] [size=3] Hey there[/size][/b][/color] [color=#FF0000] [b] [size=3]Nexites![/size][/b][/color] [color=#00BFFF] [b] [size=3] Mellophonist here with my second mod! Due to more popularity then I anticipated from my wallpaper set I\'ve decided to make a menu re-placer out of 26 most popular pictures from that set! All the photos in this pack are my Scenic images taken across Skyrim, from sweeping vistas to dark caverns, this main menu re-placer is sure to bring your drab start screen to life! 

-All images are unedited HiRes screenshots taken in game with over 150 mods enabled at one time to give these re-placers the most immersive feeling I feel I can reach

-This is not your average Menu Re-Placer that just has a bunch of scantily clad women! I pride myself of being a photographer both in game and in real life, so these photos are more artistic then some of the other menu-re-placers you\'ll find around the Nexus. [/size] 
[/b] [/color] [color=#FF4500](all images are 1920x1080)[/color]

[color=#00BFFF] [b] [size=3] If you download and enjoy my Mod I\'d really appreciate an [/size] [/b] [/color] [color=#DAA520] [b] [size=4] ENDORSEMENT. [/size] [/b] [/color] [color=#00BFFF] [b] [size=3] Its the only thing telling me I did a good job! [/size] [/b] [/color]

[color=#F0F8FF][i] [size=4]Requirements:[/size] [/i] [/color]

[url=e.silverlock.org][color=#DC143C]-SKSE[/color][/url]

[color=#F0F8FF][i] [size=4]Installation:[/size] [/i] [/color]

[color=FFD700]NMM:[/color]
[color=#00BFFF]Simply activate after download[/color]

[color=FFD700]Manual:[/color]
[color=#F0F8FF]1:[/color][color=#00BFFF]Drag and drop all four file folders (mainmenuwallpapers, meshes, SKSE, and textures) into your Skyrim DATA folder located at...[/color]
[color=#FF0000] |Local Disk C:)/Program Files x86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim|[/color]
[color=#F0F8FF]2:[/color][color=#00BFFF]Run Skyrim through SKSE[/color][color=#FF0000] (this is mandatory!) [/color]
[color=#F0F8FF]3:[/color][color=#00BFFF] Enjoy! [/color]   

[color=#F0F8FF][i] [size=4]De-Installation:[/size][/i][/color]

[color=FFD700]NMM:[/color]
[color=#00BFFF] Disable mod from loader (do a manual de-install just to be safe.)[/color]

[color=FFD700]Manual:[/color]
[color=#00BFFF]Simply remove all four files from your Skyrim Data folder.[/color]

[color=#F0F8FF][i] [size=4]Optional Files/INI Tweaks:[/size][/i][/color]

[color=#00BFFF]-If you would like to skip the Bethesda logo intro. and straight to the main menu, put \"sIntroSequence=\" (without the quotes) into your Skyrim.ini file under the [/color][color=#FF0000] (General) [/color] [color=#00BFFF]section.[/color]
[color=#00BFFF]-If you would like to remove the Bethesda logo from the bottom corner of your Main menu, please visit the following link,[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8023][color=#DC143C]No Bethesda Logo in Menu[/color][/url]
[color=#00BFFF]-If you would like to replace the menu fog with snow, please visit the following link,[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4624][color=#DC143C]Replace Loading Screen Fog with Snow[/color][/url] 

[color=#F0F8FF] [i] [size=4]You can manually select which pictures you would like to use if you only like a particular few by doing the following.[/size][/i][/color]                                            

[color=#F0F8FF]1:[/color] [color=#00BFFF] In your Skyrim Data folder find the mainmenuwallpapers folder[/color] 
[color=#F0F8FF]2:[/color] [color=#00BFFF]Delete whichever folders you don\'t like[/color]

[center][color=#F0F8FF][b][size=3]#######################################################################################################
#####[/size][/b][/color][color=#FF0000][b][size=3]In the photos section I have uploaded a picture of all 26 pictures used in the order they are filed. For example[/size][/b][/color][color=#F0F8FF][b][size=3]##### #########[/size][/b][/color][color=#FF0000][b][size=3]picture number one in the photos section will be file A, simply delete the whole file if you so desire.[/size][/b][/color][color=#F0F8FF][b][size=3]######### 
#######################################################################################################[/size][/b][/color] [/center]    

[color=#F0F8FF][i] [size=4]Credits and Thanks:[/size][/i][/color]

[color=#F0F8FF]-[/color][color=#00BFFF][b][size=3]I must thank Hellstorm102 for allowing me to use his randomizer and mesh files in this mod, he worked hard on it and its a piece of genius! I recommend checking out his Menu re-placer mod it has some beautiful shots in it. A link can be found here.[/size][/b][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3708] [color=#DC143C]main menu wallpaper replacer HD 1080p now with randomizer[/color] [/url]

[color=#F0F8FF]-[/color][color=#00BFFF][b][size=3]A shout out to SlightSith for making a tutorial on how to make the menu re-placers which without I wouldn\'t be posting this mod at all![/size][/b][/color] 

[color=#F0F8FF]-[/color][color=#00BFFF][b][size=3]Also Id like to thank Nexus Mods for establishing one of the most tight knit modding communities I\'ve ever seen.[/size][/b][/color] 

[color=#F0F8FF]-[/color][color=#00BFFF][b][size=3]And finally Id like to thank Bethesda for standing behind their modding community more then any other game company I know of.[/size][/b][/color] 

[color=#F0F8FF][i] [size=4]Change Log:[/size][/i][/color]

[color=#F0F8FF]Version Final[/color]

[color=#00BFFF]-Initial release, I have tested it multiple times uninstalling, re-installing, doing multiple downloads and it should be bug free. Leave me a comment in the posts section if you encounter any bugs and Ill address them as soon as I am able.  
-Adds 26 new backgrounds to your Main Menu  
-Added randomizer (thanks Hellstorm102) to the files, so every time you start skyrim you will have a new screen!  
-Made files NMM ready  
-Added a demo file that only contains one background for those who just want to test out the mod before downloading the main file.[/color]
                                                                                
[color=#F0F8FF][i] [size=4]Closing Thoughts:[/size][/i][/color]

[color=#00BFFF] [b] [size=3]Hope you enjoy the Mod! It was fun to make! Please leave any questions, concerns, suggestions, ideas, complaints or any other things you wish to address in the comments section I will try and speak with each of you individually. Thanks again and remember if you enjoy this mod please leave an[/size] [/b] [/color] [color=#DAA520] [b] [size=4] ENDORSEMENT. [/size] [/b] [/color] [color=#00BFFF] [b] [size=3] We do this for free and it lets us modders know were doing a good job so we can give you more great mods, support the modding community![/size] [/b] [/color]

[color=#F0F8FF][i] [size=4]Links:[/size][/i][/color]

[color=#FF0000]My wallpaper set can be found here if you would only like to use these as a desktop background or  both![/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34648] [color=#DC143C] Windows Skyrim Wallpaper Set 1 [/color] [/url]
[color=#FF0000]If you have any questions or would like to give ideas or criticisms, you can leave them in the comments section. Alternatively, I have also started a thread at the nexus forums, which I check daily, if you would like to leave your thoughts there. The thread can be found here...[/color]
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/968178-new-menu-re-placer/#entry7818890][color=#DC143C]New Menu Re-placer[/color][/url]
[color=#FF0000]Check out xxDCExx\'s new set of ENB\'s, they looks really great![/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35650/?][color=#DC143C]Mirage ENB[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35952//?][color=#DC143C]Allure ENB[/color][/url]
author: Mellophonist

files.name: Scenic Skyrim menu replacer Main
files.changelogHtml:
Initial release, I have tested it multiple times uninstalling, re-installing, doing multiple downloads and it should be bug free. Leave me a comment in the posts section if you encounter any bugs and Ill address them as soon as I am able.
Adds 26 new backgrounds to your Main Menu
Added randomizer (thanks Hellstorm102) to the files, so everytime you start skyrim you will have a new screen!
Made files NMM ready
Added a demo file that only contains one background for those who just want to test out the mod before downloading the main file.
